      • Projectile

        public Projectile(float x,
                  float y,
                  float direction,
                  float velocity,
                  float lifeTime,
                  com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
        Initialises a projectile using the provided parameters
        Parameters:
        x - The initial x-coordinate
        y - The initial y-coordinate
        direction - The direction to travel in (in degrees)
        velocity - The velocity to travel at
        lifeTime - The life time of the projectile
        texture - The projectile texture
